text: Arma tawon woɗɓe goo faandiiɓe nde ɓe holnora on ɓe holnora yimɓe maɓɓe ɓen. Tuma kala nde ɓe ruttitaa e geddi ɗin,ɓe suƴƴitee e nder majji. Si ɓe pottitaaki on, ɓe werloo kisal e mon, ɓe suri juuɗe maɓɓe ɗen, nanngee ɓe waron ɓe nokku kala ka tawɗon ɓe. Ko ɓen ɗon mooɗon, [woni ke Men] Waɗani on e maɓɓe hujja ɓannguɗo
